00029 #ifndef __RAY_H_
00030 #define __RAY_H_
00031 
00032 #include "Plane.h"
00033 #include "PlaneBoundedVolume.h"
00034 
00035 namespace omega { namespace math 
00036 {
00038         template<typename T>
00039     class Ray
00040     {
00041     protected:
00042         vector<3,T> mOrigin;
00043         vector<3,T> mDirection;
00044     public:
00045         Ray():mOrigin(vector<3,T>::Zero()), mDirection(vector<3,T>::UnitZ()) {}
00046         Ray(const vector<3,T>& origin, const vector<3,T>& direction)
00047             :mOrigin(origin), mDirection(direction) {}
00048 
00050         void setOrigin(const vector<3,T>& origin) {mOrigin = origin;} 
00052         const vector<3,T>& getOrigin(void) const {return mOrigin;} 
00053 
00055         void setDirection(const vector<3,T>& dir) {mDirection = dir;} 
00057         const vector<3,T>& getDirection(void) const {return mDirection;} 
00058 
00060                 vector<3,T> getPoint(float t) const { 
00061                         return vector<3,T>(mOrigin + (mDirection * t));
00062                 }
00063                 
00065                 vector<3,T> operator*(float t) const { 
00066                         return getPoint(t);
00067                 }
00068 
00075                 std::pair<bool, float> intersects(const Plane<T>& p) const
00076                 {
00077                         return Math<T>::intersects(*this, p);
00078                 }
00085         std::pair<bool, float> intersects(const PlaneBoundedVolume<T>& p) const
00086         {
00087             return Math<T>::intersects(*this, p.planes, p.outside == Plane<T>::POSITIVE_SIDE);
00088         }
00095                 std::pair<bool, float> intersects(const Sphere<T>& s) const
00096                 {
00097                         return Math<T>::intersects(*this, s);
00098                 }
00105                 std::pair<bool, float> intersects(const AlignedBox3<T>& box) const
00106                 {
00107                         return Math<T>::intersects(*this, box);
00108                 }
00109 
00113                 vector<3,T> projectPoint(const vector<3,T>& point) const
00114                 {
00115                         const vector<3,T>& v = mDirection;
00116                         const vector<3,T> w = point - mOrigin;
00117                         
00118                         float c1 = w.dot(v);
00119                         float c2 = v.dot(v);
00120                         float b = c1 / c2;
00121                          vector<3,T> pb = mOrigin + b * v;
00122                          return pb;
00123                 }
00124     };
00127 }
00128 }
00129 #endif
